data.eml:eml: A new species of Sarmydus Pascoe, 1867 (Cerambycidae: Prioninae: Anacolini) from Nicobar Island, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Majumder, Amitava, Drumont, Alain, Chandra, Kailash, Dubey, Anil Kumar (2019): A new species of Sarmydus Pascoe, 1867 (Cerambycidae: Prioninae: Anacolini) from Nicobar Island, India. Zootaxa 4674 (2): 235-242, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4674.2.5
